meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lisa Beach Jeff Richmond John Hawekotte Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #995.

td.p: Lisa Beach, a feature film casting associate from Los Angeles, California
Jeff Richmond, a city planner from West Hollywood, California
John Hawekotte, an attorney and CPA originally from Chicago, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $20,401)

tr.td: U.S.A.
8-LETTER WORDS
(Alex: That sounds easy.)
GOLFERS
LANGUAGES
FARMING
CHRISTMAS MUSIC
(Alex: In this category, we will have [*], actual [*]. So it's an all-audio category. You'll hear the music, then you'll have to ring in and identify it for us.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'pay child support

Lisa
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Texas cracks down on fathers who refuse to do this by putting them on a "10 Most Wanted" list')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Texas cracks down on fathers who refuse to do this by putting them on a "10 Most Wanted" list

The first clue is this piece of music. Listen:
"...in a one horse open sleigh.
O'er the fields we go..."

...

Hilton Head Island

JohnJeff
')

Jeff

tr.td: John
Jeff
Lisa
CORPORATE AMERICA
LITERATURE
THE FAR EAST
HISTORIC DATES
MOVIE LOCALES
HEAD & SHOULDERS

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
